title: EP. 289 "DETOX TIME" with Olanikee of Goddess De
description:
We have the founder and CEO of Goddess Detox here with us today reminding us to celebrate and honor ourselves. Be sure to support Goddess Detox at www.goddessdetox.org and follow them on socials @goddeessdetox and Olanikee @olanikeeosi

This week's episode is brought to you by Goddess Detox, A Spiritual Women's Wellness company.  Get your products at www.goddessdetox.org
